code: import React from'react';import{ReactComponent as Fly}from'../../../assets/img/fly.svg';import{ReactComponent as Bus}from'../../../assets/img/bus.svg';import{ReactComponent as Bicycle}from'../../../assets/img/bicycle.svg';import{ReactComponent as Onfoot}from'../../../assets/img/onfoot.svg';import{useAppDispatch}from'../../../hooks/hooks';import{setDataToPostTransport}from'../../../store/app-slice';import'./checkbox-transport.module.scss';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const transportIcons=[{type:'Fly',Icon:Fly},{type:'Bus',Icon:Bus},{type:'Bicycle',Icon:Bicycle},{type:'Onfoot',Icon:Onfoot}];function CheckboxTransport(){const dispatch=useAppDispatch();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"checkbox-transport",children:transportIcons.map(_ref=>{let{type,Icon}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"checkbox-transport__item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"checkbox-transport__checkbox",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{className:"checkbox-transport__label",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"checkbox-transport__input",type:"checkbox",value:type,name:type,onClick:evt=>dispatch(setDataToPostTransport(evt.currentTarget.name))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"checkbox-transport__icon",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Icon,{})})]})})},type);})});}export default CheckboxTransport;
